name: Trans-mission (Asaina)
description:
Stealth based platformer inspired by 80s where you change gender to pass various obstacles and enemies. As a female you double jump. As a male you can move boxes with your strong manly muscles. Get through a metallurgy factory guarded by a military in order to get control of it.

Made during GameJam 2018.

Credits:
